input.sentences: a group of friends went out to have a night out on the city .
the evening started with a few drinks .
they watched a parade that celebrated the day of the dead .
there was so many interesting things to see during the parade .
output.sentences: Several friends went out for the night in the city.
They started their evening by having drinks at the bar.
Then they watched the parade of the dead.
Several skeletons paraded past the people watching.
It was a spooky parada in celebration of Halloween.
